item.title: Trump has found a new use for tariffs
item.description: The Washington Post’s essential guide to power and influence in D.C. In today’s edition: Trump uses tariffs to help out a political ally.

item.title: Led by Trump, Republicans push to redraw election maps in multiple states
item.description: The effort has worried some in the party who have little appetite for an escalating redistricting war with Democrats.
